issue.title: Disable joint markers for all but the "active" joint when Inspector is open

content.raw: Hmm, yes I suppose so. At the same time, it's not all that helpful in the case of the car, where there are 4 joints going into the chassis. It's not possible to tell which marker goes with each joint. Think it would be useful for other models to have the markers all visible if there's no Inspector open? The alternative is to have the markers only visible when the relevant Inspector is open...This would lead to less clutter.
